title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems          As the area surrounding the battlefield grows and encroaches on the borders of the park, concern grows for the protection, preservation and conservation of its natural resources. Monocacy National Battlefield protects the history of the Civil war battle and the natural areas found in the park. There are creeks, fields, third growth forests, historical houses, and terrestrial and aquatic life that must be managed for the protection and enjoyment of present and future generations.
